duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage customers in sales conversations and promote appropriate products and financial solutions.
Identify and act on opportunities to strengthen customer relationships through a defined sales process.
Make outbound calls and engage with customers in retail branches.
Educate clients on financial wellness and PNC products.
Manage risk through adherence to all policies and procedures and demonstrate sound judgment.
Perform lobby engagement activities to connect with customers and position financial products to meet their needs.

education_certification.credential: Associates or equivalent degree with 3+ years experience.
